<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lawbringer](/Feats.aspx?ID=1352) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 35 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You trace your lineage to [archons](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=9): embodiments of heavenly virtues, guardians of the seven-tiered mountain of [Heaven](/Planes.aspx?ID=17), and nurturers of law and virtue within mortals. Your own virtue and orderly mind protect you from foes who would turn your emotions against you. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) effects, and if you roll a success on a save against an emotion effect, you get a critical success instead.

<title level="2">Lawbringer leads to...</title>
[Archon Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1358), [Enforced Order](/Feats.aspx?ID=2293)
name: Lawbringer
